synopsis.text: It is inevitable that the hour of destruction is drawing near, an event that cannot be halted. Makoto and his comrades have evolved through countless encounters and farewells, each one bringing them closer to death. Their battle may not be for the sake of the world, but for their own personal reasons. Despite this, they persist in the hope of finding tranquil days on the other side of the conflict. However, a boy, once thought to be a friend, reveals the harsh truth of humanity's destined demise with a chilling detachment. As winter descends, Makoto must make a crucial decision in order to greet the spring that lies ahead.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
